snippet: An economist argues that the best thing the president and Congress could do for small businesses right now is to provide them with economically healthier customers.
abstract: An economist argues that the best thing the president and Congress could do for small businesses right now is to provide them with economically healthier customers.

headline.main: Drilling Down: Jared Bernstein Says Small Businesses Are Not Overtaxed
